title: Freezing operators in representation theory of quantum loop algebras
summary: We prove the Hernandez conjecture on the simple $(q,t)$-characters (an analog of the Kazhdan--Lusztig conjecture) for untwisted quantum loop algebras of classical type. This result is new in type $\mathrm{C}$. We also prove that the folding homomorphism, introduced by Hernandez, gives a dimension-preserving bijective correspondence between the finite-dimensional simple representations of untwisted quantum loop algebras of classical simply-laced type and those of the corresponding doubly-twisted quantum loop algebras. This result is new in type $\mathrm{D}$. In our approach, we develop a bootstrapping method for $q$ and $(q,t)$-characters, based on the freezing operator previously introduced in the context of cluster algebras by the second named author. This method allows us to reduce statements for general simple representations in all classical types to corresponding results on core subcategories in a uniform manner.

AI.tldr: 证明了经典类型非扭曲量子环代数的简单(q,t)-特征的Hernandez猜想，并在类型C和D中取得了新结果，开发了基于冻结算子的自举方法。
AI.motivation: 研究量子环代数的表示理论，特别是验证Hernandez关于简单(q,t)-特征的猜想，该猜想类似于Kazhdan-Lusztig猜想，在经典类型中建立统一的理论框架。
AI.method: 开发了基于冻结算子的自举方法，用于处理q和(q,t)-特征，该方法允许将经典类型中一般简单表示的陈述统一地约化到核心子范畴的相应结果。
AI.result: 1. 证明了经典类型非扭曲量子环代数的简单(q,t)-特征的Hernandez猜想（类型C中的新结果）；2. 证明了折叠同态在经典单链类型和相应双扭曲量子环代数之间建立了维数保持的双射对应（类型D中的新结果）。
AI.conclusion: 通过开发基于冻结算子的自举方法，成功证明了Hernandez猜想并建立了量子环代数表示之间的对应关系，为经典类型的量子环代数表示理论提供了统一的处理框架。

title: Construction of simple quotients of Bernstein-Zelevinsky derivatives and highest derivative multisegments III: properties of minimal sequences
summary: Let $F$ be a non-Archimedean local field. For an irreducible smooth representation $π$ of $\mathrm{GL}_n(F)$ and a multisegment $\mathfrak m$, one associates a simple quotient $D_{\mathfrak m}(π)$ of a Bernstein-Zelevinsky derivative of $π$. In the preceding article, we showed that \[ \mathcal S(π, τ) :=\left\{ \mathfrak m : D_{\mathfrak m}(π)\cong τ\right\} , \] has a unique minimal element under the Zelevinsky ordering, where $\mathfrak m$ runs for all multisegments. The main result of this article includes commutativity and subsequent property of the minimal sequence. At the end of this article, we conjecture some module structure arising from the minimality.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究非阿基米德局部域上GL_n(F)不可约光滑表示π与多分段m之间的关系，证明了集合S(π,τ)在Zelevinsky序下存在唯一最小元，并探讨了最小序列的交换性和相关性质。
AI.motivation: 研究非阿基米德局部域上GL_n(F)不可约光滑表示与Bernstein-Zelevinsky导数简单商之间的关系，特别是探索多分段集合S(π,τ)的结构性质，其中D_m(π)≅τ。
AI.method: 使用Bernstein-Zelevinsky导数理论，分析多分段m与表示π的关系，证明在Zelevinsky序下集合S(π,τ)存在唯一最小元素，并研究最小序列的交换性质。
AI.result: 证明了对于给定的不可约光滑表示π和τ，集合S(π,τ)在Zelevinsky序下存在唯一最小元素，并获得了最小序列的交换性和后续性质。
AI.conclusion: 该研究建立了非阿基米德局部域上GL_n(F)表示理论中多分段集合的结构性质，提出了基于最小性的模结构猜想，为进一步研究表示理论中的导数结构提供了理论基础。

title: Construction of simple quotients of Bernstein-Zelevinsky derivatives and highest derivative multisegments II: Minimal sequences
summary: Let $F$ be a non-Archimedean local field. For any irreducible smooth representation $π$ of $\mathrm{GL}_n(F)$ and a multisegment $\mathfrak m$, we have an operation $D_{\mathfrak m}(π)$ to construct a simple quotient $τ$ of a Bernstein-Zelevinsky derivative of $π$. This article continues the previous one to study the following poset \[ \mathcal S(π, τ) :=\left\{ \mathfrak n : D_{\mathfrak n}(π)\cong τ\right\} , \] where $\mathfrak n$ runs for all the multisegments. Here the partial ordering on $\mathcal S(π, τ)$ comes from the Zelevinsky ordering. We show that the poset has a unique minimal multisegment. Along the way, we introduce two new ingredients: fine chain orderings and local minimizability.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究非阿基米德局部域上GL_n(F)不可约光滑表示π与多段式m的导数运算D_m(π)，探讨满足D_n(π)≅τ的多段式集合S(π,τ)的偏序结构，证明该偏序集存在唯一极小多段式。
AI.motivation: 研究GL_n(F)不可约光滑表示π与多段式m的导数运算D_m(π)的性质，特别是满足特定同构条件D_n(π)≅τ的多段式集合S(π,τ)的偏序结构，旨在理解这些多段式之间的序关系并寻找极小元。
AI.method: 引入两个新工具：精细链序和局部极小化性，用于分析多段式集合S(π,τ)的偏序结构。在Zelevinsky序的基础上，研究该偏序集的性质，证明存在唯一极小多段式。
AI.result: 证明了对于任意不可约光滑表示π和简单商τ，偏序集S(π,τ)具有唯一极小多段式。这一结果深化了对Bernstein-Zelevinsky导数运算和Zelevinsky序的理解。
AI.conclusion: 通过引入精细链序和局部极小化性等新工具，成功分析了满足D_n(π)≅τ的多段式集合S(π,τ)的偏序结构，证明了该偏序集存在唯一极小元，为相关表示论研究提供了新的理论工具和结果。

title: iQuantum groups and iHopf algebras II: dual canonical bases
summary: Building on the iHopf algebra realization of quasi-split universal iquantum groups developed in a prequel, we construct the dual canonical basis for a universal iquantum group of arbitrary finite type, which are further shown to be preserved by the ibraid group action; this recovers the results of Lu-Pan in ADE type obtained earlier in a geometric approach. Moreover, we identify the dual canonical basis for the Drinfeld double quantum group of arbitrary finite type, which is realized via iHopf algebra on the double Borel, with Berenstein-Greenstein's double canonical basis, settling several of their conjectures.

AI.tldr: 本文基于前作中发展的iHopf代数实现，为任意有限型通用iquantum群构造了对偶典范基，证明了其在ibraid群作用下保持不变，并将Drinfeld双量子群的对偶典范基与Berenstein-Greenstein的双典范基等同，解决了他们的若干猜想。
AI.motivation: 本文旨在为任意有限型通用iquantum群构造对偶典范基，并研究其在ibraid群作用下的不变性，同时将Drinfeld双量子群的对偶典范基与现有理论中的双典范基联系起来，解决相关猜想。
AI.method: 基于前作中发展的iHopf代数实现方法，首先构造了任意有限型通用iquantum群的对偶典范基，然后证明了该基在ibraid群作用下的不变性。进一步，通过iHopf代数在双Borel上的实现，识别了Drinfeld双量子群的对偶典范基。
AI.result: 成功构造了任意有限型通用iquantum群的对偶典范基，并证明了其在ibraid群作用下的不变性，恢复了Lu-Pan在ADE型中的几何方法结果。同时，将Drinfeld双量子群的对偶典范基与Berenstein-Greenstein的双典范基等同，解决了他们的若干猜想。
AI.conclusion: 本文系统建立了任意有限型通用iquantum群的对偶典范基理论，证明了其良好的代数性质，并将该理论与现有双典范基理论统一，为量子群表示论提供了重要的基础工具。

title: Complete invariants for simultaneous similarity
summary: We consider the variety $(k^{n\times n})^{p}$ under the action of $GL_{n}$ by simultaneous similarity. We define discrete and continuous invariants which completely determine the orbits. The discrete invariants induce a disjoint decomposition of the variety into finitely many locally closed $GL_{n}$-stable subsets and for each of these we construct finitely many invariant morphisms to $k$ separating the orbits. The complicated action of $GL_{n}$ by similarity is reduced to left multiplication of a product of $GL_{l_{i}}$'s on a product of $k^{l_{i}\times m_{i}}$'s. An analogous result holds for the left-right action of $GL_{m}\times GL_{n}$ on $(k^{m\times n })^{p}$ and more general for all varieties of finite dimensional modules over some finitely generated algebra.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了矩阵空间在相似变换下的轨道分类问题，通过构造离散和连续不变量完全确定轨道，将复杂的相似作用简化为更简单的群作用。
AI.motivation: 研究矩阵空间在相似变换下的轨道分类问题，特别是同时相似变换下的矩阵组轨道，这是表示理论和代数几何中的重要问题。
AI.method: 定义离散和连续不变量来完全确定轨道；离散不变量诱导出有限多个局部闭的GL_n稳定子集的分解；为每个子集构造有限多个到k的不变态射来分离轨道；将复杂的相似作用简化为GL_{l_i}在k^{l_i×m_i}上的左乘作用。
AI.result: 建立了轨道分类的完整理论：离散和连续不变量完全确定了轨道；获得了有限多个局部闭子集的分解；构造了分离轨道的不变态射；将相似作用简化为更简单的群作用。
AI.conclusion: 该方法不仅适用于同时相似作用，还可推广到GL_m×GL_n在矩阵空间上的左右作用，以及更一般的有限生成代数的有限维模的变种，为表示论中的轨道分类问题提供了系统框架。

title: Hall induction for cotangent representations and wheel conditions
summary: In this short note we study the Hall induction of cotangent representations of reductive groups. We prove its torsion freeness in Borel-Moore homology. In K-theory we find an analog of wheel conditions verified by the image of restriction map to the fixed point and consider examples.

AI.tldr: 研究约化群余切表示的Hall归纳，证明其在Borel-Moore同调中的无挠性，在K理论中发现了限制映射到不动点的像满足轮条件
AI.motivation: 研究约化群余切表示的Hall归纳性质，探索其在同调理论和K理论中的代数结构特性
AI.method: 使用Hall归纳方法研究余切表示，在Borel-Moore同调中证明无挠性，在K理论中分析限制映射到不动点的像并验证轮条件
AI.result: 证明了Hall归纳在Borel-Moore同调中的无挠性，在K理论中发现了限制映射像满足轮条件，并通过具体例子进行了验证
AI.conclusion: 约化群余切表示的Hall归纳具有重要的代数结构性质，在Borel-Moore同调中无挠，在K理论中满足轮条件，为相关表示论研究提供了新视角

title: Quivers with Involutions and Shifted Twisted Yangians via Coulomb Branches II
comment: 24 pages. Any comments are welcome. arXiv admin note: substantial text overlap with arXiv:2510.12118 by other authors
summary: To a quiver with involution, we show that there is an algebra homomorphism from the corresponding shifted twisted Yangian to the quantized Coulomb branch algebra of the 3d $\mathcal{N}=4$ involution-fixed part of the quiver gauge theory in the second symmetric power case.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了带对合的箭图，证明了从相应的移位扭曲Yangian到3d N=4规范理论对合固定部分在二次对称幂情况下的量子化库仑分支代数存在代数同态。
AI.motivation: 研究带对合的箭图与其对应的3d N=4规范理论之间的关系，探索量子可积系统（移位扭曲Yangian）与规范理论库仑分支代数之间的对应关系。
AI.method: 通过数学构造方法，建立从移位扭曲Yangian到量子化库仑分支代数的代数同态映射，在二次对称幂的特殊情况下进行具体分析。
AI.result: 成功证明了存在从移位扭曲Yangian到量子化库仑分支代数的代数同态，建立了量子可积系统与规范理论之间的具体联系。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为理解带对合箭图的表示论与3d N=4规范理论物理结构之间的深刻联系提供了新的数学框架和具体实现。

title: The Maschke octic contains 96 pairwise disjoint lines
summary: Miyaoka proved that a smooth surface of degree $d$ in ${\mathbf{P}}^3({\mathbb{C}})$ contains at most $2d(d-2)$ pairwise disjoint lines. In this note, we verify that the Maschke octic contains $96$ pairwise disjoint lines, thereby proving that Miyaoka's bound is optimal for $d=8$.

AI.tldr: Miyaoka证明了复射影空间中光滑曲面的最大不相交直线数上界为2d(d-2)，本文验证了Maschke八次曲面包含96条不相交直线，证明该上界在d=8时是最优的。
AI.motivation: Miyaoka给出了复射影空间中光滑曲面上不相交直线数量的上界2d(d-2)，但该上界是否紧致（即能否达到）是未解决的问题。本文旨在验证d=8时该上界是否最优。
AI.method: 通过具体构造和分析Maschke八次曲面（一种特殊的光滑八次曲面），验证其包含96条两两不相交的直线。由于2×8×(8-2)=96，这恰好达到Miyaoka上界。
AI.result: 成功证明Maschke八次曲面确实包含96条两两不相交的直线，从而证明Miyaoka上界在d=8时是最优的（紧致的）。
AI.conclusion: Miyaoka关于复射影空间中光滑曲面上不相交直线数量的上界2d(d-2)在d=8时是最优的，通过Maschke八次曲面的构造达到了该上界。

title: Identities of Irreducible Representations and Gassmann Equivalence
summary: Identities of complex irreducible representations of finite groups can be explicitly constructed from character value sets. Among other things, these identities determine representations up to Gassmann equivalency. Some examples of identities related to spherical space forms and to representations of finite $p$-groups are presented. Some old results on irreducible representations with the same identities are revisited

AI.tldr: 该论文研究有限群复不可约表示的恒等式，这些恒等式可以从特征值集合显式构造，能够确定表示直到Gassmann等价性，并给出了球面空间形式和有限p-群表示的相关例子。
AI.motivation: 研究有限群复不可约表示的恒等式构造，探索这些恒等式在确定表示等价性方面的作用，特别是Gassmann等价性，并重新审视具有相同恒等式的不可约表示的相关结果。
AI.method: 从特征值集合显式构造有限群复不可约表示的恒等式，通过分析这些恒等式来确定表示直到Gassmann等价性，并给出球面空间形式和有限p-群表示的具体例子。
AI.result: 成功构造了从特征值集合得到的表示恒等式，证明这些恒等式能够确定表示直到Gassmann等价性，提供了球面空间形式和有限p-群表示的具体恒等式例子，重新审视了具有相同恒等式的不可约表示的相关结果。
AI.conclusion: 有限群复不可约表示的恒等式可以从特征值集合显式构造，这些恒等式在确定表示直到Gassmann等价性方面具有重要作用，相关例子展示了该方法在球面空间形式和有限p-群表示中的应用价值。

title: Quantum Hamiltonian reductions for W-algebras
comment: Small revisions, 19 pages. Comments are welcome
summary: In this paper, we establish a general criterion for good pairs, namely pairs consisting of a nilpotent orbit and an even good grading in a simple Lie algebra, which guarantees the existence of a quantum Hamiltonian reduction between associated affine W-algebras. In particular, we show that for type A, any two affine W-algebras associated with two adjacent nilpotent orbits are related by quantum Hamiltonian reductions in full generality.

AI.tldr: 该论文建立了判断"好对"（由幂零轨道和偶好分级组成的对）的一般准则，确保相关仿射W-代数之间存在量子哈密顿约化关系，特别在A型中证明了相邻幂零轨道对应的仿射W-代数之间普遍存在量子哈密顿约化关系。
AI.motivation: 研究简单李代数中幂零轨道与偶好分级构成的"好对"与仿射W-代数之间的量子哈密顿约化关系，旨在建立一般性理论框架，特别是在A型李代数中探索相邻幂零轨道对应W-代数的关联性。
AI.method: 建立了一般性准则来判断"好对"（nilpotent orbit和even good grading组成的对），该准则能保证相关仿射W-代数之间存在量子哈密顿约化关系。特别针对A型李代数，证明了任意两个相邻幂零轨道对应的仿射W-代数之间都存在量子哈密顿约化关系。
AI.result: 成功建立了判断"好对"的一般准则，该准则能确保仿射W-代数之间存在量子哈密顿约化。在A型李代数中，证明了任意两个相邻幂零轨道对应的仿射W-代数之间都存在量子哈密顿约化关系，这一结果具有普遍性。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为理解简单李代数中幂零轨道结构与仿射W-代数之间的量子哈密顿约化关系提供了重要理论框架，特别是在A型中揭示了相邻幂零轨道对应W-代数的系统性关联，为相关数学物理研究奠定了基础。

title: Maulik-Okounkov quantum loop groups and Drinfeld double of preprojective $K$-theoretic Hall algebras
comment: 86 pages. The main result of the paper has been strengthened and generalised, many corrections and improvement of the statements. Comments are very welcome!
summary: In this paper we prove the following results: Given the Drinfeld double $\mathcal{A}^{ext}_{Q}$ of the localised preprojective $K$-theoretic Hall algebra $\mathcal{A}^{+}_{Q}$ of quiver type $Q$ with the Cartan elements, there is a $\mathbb{Q}(q,t_e)_{e\in E}$-Hopf algebra isomorphism between $\mathcal{A}^{ext}_{Q}$ and the localised Maulik-Okounkov quantum loop group $U^{MO}_{q}(\hat{\mathfrak{g}}_{Q})$ of quiver type $Q$. Moreover, we prove the isomorphism of $\mathbb{Z}[q^{\pm1},t_{e}^{\pm1}]_{e\in E}$-algebras between the positive/negative half of the integral Maulik-Okounkov quantum loop group $U_{q}^{MO,\pm,\mathbb{Z}}(\hat{\mathfrak{g}}_{Q})$ with the (opposite) algebra of the integral preprojective (nilpotent) $K$-theoretic Hall algebra $\mathcal{A}^{+,\mathbb{Z}}_{Q}$ ($(\mathcal{A}^{+,nilp,\mathbb{Z}}_{Q})^{op}$) of the same quiver type $Q$. As the application, we prove that one can identify the wall subalgebra $U_{q}^{MO,\mathbb{Z}}(\mathfrak{g}_{w})$ as the root subalgebra $\mathcal{B}_{\mathbf{m},w}^{\mathbb{Z}}$ in the slope subalgebra $\mathcal{B}_{\mathbf{m}}^{\mathbb{Z}}$ as the quasitriangular Hopf $\mathbb{Z}[q^{\pm1},t_e^{\pm1}]_{e\in E}$-algebras. Moreover we use the freeness of the wall subalgebra in MO quantum loop groups to prove the freeness of the preprojective $K$-theoretic Hall algebra for arbitrary torus $\mathbb{C}_q^*\subset A\subset T$.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明了Drinfeld双代数与Maulik-Okounkov量子loop群之间的同构关系，并建立了K理论Hall代数与量子群积分形式之间的对应。
AI.motivation: 研究quiver类型的K理论Hall代数与量子loop群之间的深刻联系，建立不同数学结构之间的统一框架。
AI.method: 通过构造Drinfeld双代数与Maulik-Okounkov量子loop群之间的Hopf代数同构，并证明积分形式代数之间的同构关系。
AI.result: 证明了$\mathcal{A}^{ext}_{Q}$与$U^{MO}_{q}(\hat{\mathfrak{g}}_{Q})$的Hopf代数同构，以及积分形式代数之间的同构，并建立了wall子代数与根子代数的对应关系。
AI.conclusion: 建立了quiver类型的K理论Hall代数与量子loop群之间的完整对应关系，为相关代数结构的研究提供了统一的理论框架。

title: On the computation of Kronecker coefficients I: column-row polytopes
comment: Most of the results of the paper have been presented before in the Pacific Rim Mathematical Association Congress 2022 in Vancouver and in the VI Congreso Latinoamericano de Matemáticos 2021 in Uruguay. In the second version a few typos were corrected and Theorem 6.5 was added
summary: We present a way of computing Kronecker coefficients that uses a new family of rational convex polytopes, called column-row polytopes. We give several different formulas for the computation. They are alternating sums of numbers of integer points of either column-row polytopes or faces of column-row polytopes. We also compute the maximal dimension of these polytopes and give new proofs of some known results of more theoretical nature.

AI.tldr: 本文提出使用列-行多面体计算Kronecker系数的新方法，通过整数点计数公式实现计算
AI.motivation: 寻找计算Kronecker系数的有效方法，传统计算方法存在困难，需要新的几何工具
AI.method: 引入新的有理凸多面体家族（列-行多面体），提供多种交替求和公式，通过计算整数点数量实现
AI.result: 给出了Kronecker系数的多种计算公式，计算了多面体的最大维度，并重新证明了一些已知理论结果
AI.conclusion: 列-行多面体为计算Kronecker系数提供了有效的几何框架，扩展了计算方法并加深了理论理解

title: Generalized Rank via Minimal Subposet
comment: 20 pages, 1 figure. v3: fixed a problem in Construction E. We thank Dey and Lesnick for pointing out the issue. v2: improved exposition of earlier work, clarified a remark, and weakened assumptions on the poset for Theorem C
summary: Let $\mathcal{C}$ be a small, connected category with finite hom-sets. We show that if the embedding of a connected subcategory $\mathcal{J}$ is both initial and final, then the restriction of any $\mathcal{C}$-module along $\mathcal{J}$ preserves the generalized rank-or equivalently, the multiplicity of the ``entire" interval modules for $\mathcal{C}$ and $\mathcal{J}$. Conversely, we prove that this property characterizes initial and final embeddings when both $\mathcal{C}$ and $\mathcal{J}$ are posets satisfying certain mild constraints and the embedding is full. For $\mathcal{C}$ a poset under these conditions, we describe the minimal full subposet whose embedding is initial or final. This generalizes an observation made by Dey and Lesnick. We also extend a result of Kinser on the generalized rank invariant to small categories.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了小连通范畴中初始和最终嵌入对广义秩不变量的影响，证明了当子范畴嵌入既是初始又是最终时，限制函子保持广义秩，并在特定条件下证明了这一性质的逆命题。
AI.motivation: 研究小连通范畴中初始和最终嵌入如何影响广义秩不变量，特别是理解在什么条件下限制函子能够保持广义秩，这对于拓扑数据分析中的持续性同调理论有重要意义。
AI.method: 使用范畴论方法，分析小连通范畴及其子范畴的嵌入性质，研究限制函子对广义秩不变量的影响。通过证明当嵌入既是初始又是最终时，限制函子保持广义秩，并在特定条件下证明逆命题。
AI.result: 证明了当连通子范畴的嵌入既是初始又是最终时，任何C-模沿J的限制都保持广义秩。对于满足特定条件的偏序集，这一性质刻画了初始和最终嵌入。描述了满足这些条件的最小全子偏序集。
AI.conclusion: 初始和最终嵌入在保持广义秩不变量方面起着关键作用，这一结果推广了Dey和Lesnick的观察，并将Kinser关于广义秩不变量的结果扩展到小范畴。

title: Spectral gap for the signed interchange process with arbitrary sets
summary: In 2020, F. Cesi introduced a random walk on the hyperoctahedral group $B_n$ and analysed its spectral gap when the allowed generators are transpositions and diagonal elements corresponding to singletons. In this paper we extend the allowed generators to transpositions and any diagonal elements, and characterise completely the set of representations from which the spectral gap arises. This settles a conjecture posed in Cesi's paper.

AI.tldr: 本文扩展了Cesi在超八面体群上随机游走的研究，将生成元从单子对角元素扩展到任意对角元素，并完整刻画了谱隙的来源表示集，解决了Cesi论文中的猜想。
AI.motivation: Cesi在2020年研究了超八面体群B_n上的随机游走，但只考虑了单子对角元素作为生成元。本文旨在扩展这一研究，允许任意对角元素作为生成元，并完整刻画谱隙的来源表示，解决Cesi论文中提出的猜想。
AI.method: 扩展Cesi的随机游走模型，将生成元从仅限于单子对角元素推广到任意对角元素。通过分析超八面体群的表示理论，系统研究随机游走的谱隙性质，并完整刻画产生谱隙的表示集合。
AI.result: 成功将Cesi的结果推广到任意对角元素的情况，完整刻画了谱隙的来源表示集，从而完全解决了Cesi论文中提出的猜想。
AI.conclusion: 本文扩展了超八面体群上随机游走的研究，将生成元推广到任意对角元素，完整刻画了谱隙的来源表示，解决了Cesi的猜想，为相关随机游走理论提供了更完整的理解。

title: Algorithms for parabolic inductions and Jacquet modules in $\mathrm{GL}_n$
summary: In this article, we present algorithms for computing parabolic inductions and Jacquet modules for the general linear group $G$ over a non-Archimedean local field. Given the Zelevinsky data or Langlands data of an irreducible smooth representation $π$ of $G$ and an essentially square-integrable representation $σ$, we explicitly determine the Jacquet module of $π$ with respect to $σ$ and the socle of the normalized parabolic induction $π\times σ$. Our result builds on and extends some previous work of Mœglin-Waldspurger, Jantzen, Mínguez, and Lapid-Mínguez, and also uses other methods such as sequences of derivatives and an exotic duality. As an application, we give a simple algorithm for computing the highest derivative multisegment and an algorithm for computing the Langlands parameter of the highest Bernstein-Zelevinsky derivatives.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了计算一般线性群上抛物诱导和Jacquet模的算法，能够根据不可约光滑表示的Zelevinsky数据或Langlands数据，显式确定其关于本质平方可积表示的Jacquet模和抛物诱导的socle。
AI.motivation: 研究一般线性群上表示理论中的抛物诱导和Jacquet模计算问题，扩展Mœglin-Waldspurger、Jantzen、Mínguez、Lapid-Mínguez等人的先前工作，为表示论中的具体计算提供有效算法。
AI.method: 基于Zelevinsky数据或Langlands数据，使用导数序列和奇异对偶等方法，显式确定Jacquet模和抛物诱导的socle，构建计算算法。
AI.result: 提出了计算Jacquet模和抛物诱导socle的显式算法，并应用于计算最高导数多段和最高Bernstein-Zelevinsky导数的Langlands参数。
AI.conclusion: 本文发展了计算一般线性群上抛物诱导和Jacquet模的系统算法，扩展了先前工作，为表示论中的具体计算提供了有效工具，并在导数计算和Langlands参数确定方面有重要应用。

title: Seminormal bases of cyclotomic Hecke-Clifford algebras
summary: In this paper, we describe actions of standard generators on certain bases of simple modules for semisimple cyclotomic Hecke-Clifford superalgebras. As applications, we explicitly construct a complete set of primitive idempotents and seminormal bases for these algebras.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了半单分圆Hecke-Clifford超代数简单模上标准生成元在特定基上的作用，并应用这些结果构造了完整的本原幂等元和半正规基。
AI.motivation: 研究半单分圆Hecke-Clifford超代数简单模的结构，理解标准生成元在特定基上的作用，为构造本原幂等元和半正规基提供理论基础。
AI.method: 描述标准生成元在简单模特定基上的作用，利用这些作用关系来构造完整的本原幂等元集合和半正规基。
AI.result: 成功描述了标准生成元在简单模特定基上的作用，并明确构造了这些代数的完整本原幂等元集合和半正规基。
AI.conclusion: 通过分析标准生成元在简单模基上的作用，实现了对半单分圆Hecke-Clifford超代数结构的深入理解，并成功构造了重要的代数结构元素。

title: CoHA of Cyclic Quivers and an Integral Form of Affine Yangians
comment: v2: 67 pages, minor corrections and some detailed clarifications, slightly stronger results: calculation of full integral Maulik-Okounkov Yangian for cyclic quivers; v1: 52 pages, comments welcome
summary: We calculate the deformed and non-deformed cohomological Hall algebra (CoHA) of the preprojective algebra for the case of cyclic quivers by studying the Kontsevich-Soibelman CoHA and using tools from cohomological Donaldson-Thomas theory. We show that for the cyclic quiver of length $K$, this algebra is the universal enveloping algebra of the positive half of a certain extension of matrix differential operators on $\mathbb{C}^{*}$, while its deformation gives a positive half of an explicit integral form of Guay's Affine Yangian $\ddot{\mathcal{Y}}_{\hbar_1,\hbar_2}(\mathfrak{gl}(K))$. By the main theorem of Botta-Davison (2023) and Schiffmann-Vasserot (2023), we also determine the Maulik-Okounkov Yangian for the case of cyclic quivers. Furthermore, we explain the construction of factorization coproduct, provide evidence for the strong rationality conjecture, calculate the spherical subalgebra of the non-deformed CoHA for any quiver without loops, recover results about the CoHA of compactly supported semistable sheaves on the minimal resolution of the Kleinian singularity $\mathbb{C}^2/\mathbb{Z}_{K}$ and identify a commutative algebra inside the additive shuffle algebra associated to the cyclic quiver. We end by conjecturally relating the obtained integral form with the algebra defined by Gaiotto-Rapčák-Zhou, in the context of twisted M-theory.

AI.tldr: 该论文计算了循环箭图预投射代数的变形与非变形上同调Hall代数，建立了与矩阵微分算子、仿射Yangian等代数结构的联系，并探讨了其在扭M理论中的潜在应用。
AI.motivation: 研究循环箭图预投射代数的上同调Hall代数结构，探索其与矩阵微分算子、仿射Yangian等已知代数结构的关系，为理解代数表示论与几何物理之间的联系提供新视角。
AI.method: 使用Kontsevich-Soibelman上同调Hall代数理论，结合上同调Donaldson-Thomas理论工具，计算循环箭图预投射代数的变形与非变形CoHA结构。
AI.result: 对于长度为K的循环箭图，非变形CoHA是某矩阵微分算子代数正半部分的泛包络代数；变形CoHA给出了Guay仿射Yangian显式积分形式的正半部分；确定了循环箭图的Maulik-Okounkov Yangian。
AI.conclusion: 建立了循环箭图预投射代数CoHA与多种重要代数结构的精确对应关系，为理解代数表示论、几何不变量理论与物理理论（特别是扭M理论）之间的深刻联系提供了新的数学框架。

title: Dual of the Geometric Lemma and the Second Adjointness Theorem for $p$-adic reductive groups
comment: 20 pages, comments welcome, v2: fixed some typos, v3: minor corrections
summary: Let $P,Q$ be standard parabolic subgroups of a $p$-adic reductive group $G$. We study the smooth dual of the filtration on a parabolically induced module arising from the geometric lemma associated to the cosets $P\setminus G/Q$. We prove that the dual filtration coincides with the filtration associated to the cosets $P\setminus G/Q^-$ via the Bernstein-Casselman canonical pairing from the second adjointness of parabolic induction. This result generalizes a result of Bezrukavnikov-Kazhdan on the explicit description in the second adjointness. Along the way, we also study some group theoretic results.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了p-adic约化群中抛物诱导模的几何引理相关滤过及其对偶，证明了该对偶滤过与通过Bernstein-Casselman典范配对从第二伴随性得到的滤过一致。
AI.motivation: 研究p-adic约化群中抛物诱导模的几何引理相关滤过的光滑对偶，旨在推广Bezrukavnikov-Kazhdan关于第二伴随性中明确描述的结果。
AI.method: 通过研究几何引理中与陪集P\G/Q相关的滤过，利用Bernstein-Casselman典范配对和第二伴随性，分析其对偶滤过与陪集P\G/Q⁻相关滤过的一致性。
AI.result: 证明了抛物诱导模的几何引理相关滤过的对偶滤过与通过Bernstein-Casselman典范配对从第二伴随性得到的滤过一致，推广了Bezrukavnikov-Kazhdan的结果。
AI.conclusion: 该研究建立了抛物诱导模几何引理相关滤过的对偶与第二伴随性中Bernstein-Casselman配对所得滤过之间的等价关系，深化了对p-adic群表示理论中几何结构的理解。

title: Higher spin representations of the Yangian of $\mathfrak{sl}_2$ and R-matrices
summary: We study higher spin (pure and mixed spin) representations of the Yangian of $\mathfrak{sl}_2$. We provide a geometric realization in terms of the critical cohomology of representations of the quiver with potential of Bykov and Zinn-Justin [BZJ20]. When the framing dimension is 1, it recovers the evaluation pullback of the $\ell+1$-dimensional irreducible representation of $\mathfrak{sl}_2$. We introduce the lattice model and prove that its partition function coincides with the weight function constructed using the framed shuffle formula. The latter follows the approach of Rimányi, Tarasov and Varchenko [RTV15].

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了𝔰𝔩₂杨代数的更高自旋表示，提供了基于Bykov和Zinn-Justin的带势箭图表示的临界上同调的几何实现，并引入了晶格模型证明其配分函数与框架洗牌公式构造的权重函数一致。
AI.motivation: 研究𝔰𝔩₂杨代数的更高自旋（纯自旋和混合自旋）表示，为这些表示提供几何实现，并建立与晶格模型之间的联系。
AI.method: 1. 使用Bykov和Zinn-Justin的带势箭图表示的临界上同调进行几何实现；2. 当框架维数为1时，恢复𝔰𝔩₂的ℓ+1维不可约表示的评估拉回；3. 引入晶格模型并证明其配分函数与通过框架洗牌公式构造的权重函数一致；4. 遵循Rimányi、Tarasov和Varchenko的方法。
AI.result: 1. 成功为𝔰𝔩₂杨代数的更高自旋表示提供了几何实现；2. 建立了晶格模型配分函数与框架洗牌公式构造的权重函数之间的等价性；3. 在框架维数为1的特殊情况下，恢复了已知的𝔰𝔩₂表示。
AI.conclusion: 该研究通过几何方法和晶格模型为𝔰𝔩₂杨代数的更高自旋表示提供了新的视角和实现，建立了不同数学结构之间的联系，扩展了对杨代数表示理论的理解。

title: On generalization of Breuil--Schraen's $\mathscr{L}$-invariants to $\mathrm{GL}_n$
summary: Let $p$ be prime number and $K$ be a $p$-adic field. We systematically compute the higher $\mathrm{Ext}$-groups between locally analytic generalized Steinberg representations (LAGS for short) of $\mathrm{GL}_n(K)$ via a new combinatorial treatment of some spectral sequences arising from the so-called Tits complex. Such spectral sequences degenerate at the second page and each $\mathrm{Ext}$-group admits a canonical filtration whose graded pieces are terms in the second page of the corresponding spectral sequence. For each pair of LAGS, we are particularly interested their $\mathrm{Ext}$-groups in the bottom two non-vanishing degrees. We write down an explicit basis for each graded piece (under the canonical filtration) of such an $\mathrm{Ext}$-group, and then describe the cup product maps between such $\mathrm{Ext}$-groups using these bases. As an application, we generalize Breuil's $\mathscr{L}$-invariants for $\mathrm{GL}_2(\mathbb{Q}_p)$ and Schraen's higher $\mathscr{L}$-invariants for $\mathrm{GL}_3(\mathbb{Q}_p)$ to $\mathrm{GL}_n(K)$. Along the way, we also establish a generalization of Bernstein--Zelevinsky geometric lemma to admissible locally analytic representations constructed by Orlik--Strauch, generalizing a result in Schraen's thesis for $\mathrm{GL}_3(\mathbb{Q}_p)$.

AI.tldr: 本文系统计算了GL_n(K)的局部解析广义Steinberg表示之间的高阶Ext群，通过Tits复形谱序列的新组合处理方法，得到显式基和杯积映射，并将Breuil和Schraen的L-不变量推广到GL_n(K)
AI.motivation: 研究p-adic域上GL_n的局部解析广义Steinberg表示之间的Ext群结构，特别是底部两个非零次数的Ext群，旨在推广Breuil和Schraen的L-不变量理论到一般GL_n情形
AI.method: 使用Tits复形构造谱序列，通过新的组合处理方法证明谱序列在第二页退化，为每个Ext群建立典范滤过，其分级分量为对应谱序列第二页的项，为每对LAGS的底部两个非零次数的Ext群写出显式基
AI.result: 谱序列在第二页退化，每个Ext群有典范滤过，分级分量对应谱序列第二页项；给出了底部两个非零次数Ext群的显式基描述；用这些基描述了杯积映射；将Breuil的GL_2(Q_p)和Schraen的GL_3(Q_p)的L-不变量推广到GL_n(K)
AI.conclusion: 建立了GL_n(K)局部解析广义Steinberg表示Ext群计算的系统框架，推广了Breuil和Schraen的L-不变量理论，并建立了Orlik-Strauch构造的可容许局部解析表示的Bernstein-Zelevinsky几何引理的推广
